pkgmetadata.longdescription: Test for Discretized Normality in Ordinal Data // Tests whether multivariate ordinal data may stem from discretizing a multivariate normal distribution. The test is described by Foldnes and Grnneberg (2019) doi:10.1080/10705511.2019.1673168. In addition, an adjusted polychoric correlation estimator is provided that takes marginal knowledge into account, as described by Grnneberg and Foldnes (2022) doi:10.1037/met0000495.
